summary: "The Bachelor" is an ABC reality TV show that started in 2002. It features one bachelor who dates many women to find his true love. The show has had 25 seasons hosted by Chris Harrison and has led to other popular shows like "The Bachelorette" and "Bachelor in Paradise". The series is so successful it has even spawned international versions. ABC has renewed it for a 29th season, set to air in 2024.
title: The Bachelor (American TV series)
